\
I am a PhD Candidate in Psychology at [Columbia University](https://psychology.columbia.edu/){target="_blank"}. 

My research focuses on the intersection of social support (practical and emotional help from close others) and self-regulation.


My CV is available [here](files/KatherineZeeCV.pdf){target="_blank"}.
